markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2956) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Summoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=96)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2954)

</column>

---

You gain one [summoner feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=18/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another summoner feat.

<title level="2">Advanced Synergy leads to...</title>
[Signature Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2960)
name: Advanced Synergy
